actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to modify the effective date of the recently-established procedure for determining the public debt limit as a part of the congressional budget process.

summary.text: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that the first concurrent budget resolution relating to the public debt limit shall have the beginning date of June 1, 1980.

titles.title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to modify the effective date of the recently-established procedure for determining the public debt limit as a part of the congressional budget process.
